summary: Ellis, the piromant Follower Merriable UNP
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-eoO6M466mpo/Uwn_YdZeeyI/AAAAAAAAAVE/UCd4Yrb1aAU/w604-h113-no/title.png[/img]
[color=#ff6600][size=5]Chose lenguage:[/color][/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51345/?][img]http://masfalet.com/public/userfiles/languages/icon/United-Kingdom-flag-icon.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51353/?][img]http://masfalet.com/public/userfiles/languages/icon/Spain-Flag-icon.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JcksjxZ.png[/img]

[color=#ff6600][size=3]Ellis details:[/size][/color]
Race: Nord
Name: Ellis, the priomant
Level: 1-80
Body: UNP Body
Default Armor: hide armor
Default weapon: Daedric sword
Magic : FireBreathShout, Fireball, Incinerate and Healing
Combat style : spellsword
Location : The drunken hunter
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JcksjxZ.png[/img]

[color=#ff6600][size=3]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url] or any other UNP body
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?]Pretty face[/url]

[color=#ff6600][size=3]Change log:[/size][/color]
V3 - First public release
V3.1 - Added a cool gauntlel from Tera Armors
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JcksjxZ.png[/img]

asianboy345 for the amazing mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA Armors Collection[/url] and give me permission to use it.
